it.polimi.ingsw.LM34.Controller.NonInteractiveContexts

Class EndGameContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.LM34.Controller.AbstractGameContext
        • it.polimi.ingsw.LM34.Controller.NonInteractiveContexts.EndGameContext

  • public class EndGameContext
extends AbstractGameContext
    End game calculation players' scores and presentation of the results of the match are performed in this AbstractGameContext

    • Method Detail

      • interactWithPlayer

        public java.lang.Void interactWithPlayer(java.lang.Object... args)
        Entry point of the class. This method is called by the game manager at the end of the game in order to calculate final victory points of each player that has joined the game and declare the winner based on the highest score
        Specified by:
        interactWithPlayer in class AbstractGameContext

      • onEndCalculateVictoryPointsPerPlayerByVentureCards

        public java.lang.Integer onEndCalculateVictoryPointsPerPlayerByVentureCards(Player player)
        Returns:
        the ResourceType of VICTORY_POINTS that are provided by venture cards the player has bought along the game

      • onEndCalculateVictoryPointsPerPlayerByResources

        public void onEndCalculateVictoryPointsPerPlayerByResources(Player player)
        Calculate the VICTORY_POINTS of the player based on the Rules and the excommunication tiles applied during the game
        Parameters:
        player - that will have his score influenced by this step

      • addDevelopmentCardPenalty

        public void addDevelopmentCardPenalty(DevelopmentCardColor cardType,
                                      java.lang.Integer pointsPenalty)
        Excommunication card of the III period, that related to number of card a player has, add their penalty to this map
        Parameters:
        cardType - specified by the VictoryPointsPenalty card
        pointsPenalty - (VICTORY_POINTS) of penalty for that effect
